data.message: Today is the last day of the Jazz Festival. Please expect heavy traffic at Ft. Adams. Vehicles will be exiting this evening at approximately 7:00 p.m. so please plan your travels accordingly.

The Newport Jazz Festival will be held Friday August 4, 2017 to Sunday August 6, 2017 at Fort Adams State Park. Doors open at 10:00 a.m. and it is scheduled to end at sundown. 

The parking for the festival opens at 8:00 a.m. There will be uniformed Newport Police Officers assigned to the festival to assist with traffic control.

We anticipate a heavy volume of traffic.  Please plan your travels accordingly.

page_data.phone: (401) 847-1306 for non-emergency  routine calls (401) 847-1212 is the emergency line ONLY
